abstract: Denny Hamlin wins opening round in Chase for the Sprint Cup at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin won the opening round of Nascar’s playoffs, rallying from last to first on Sunday at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill., to earn an automatic spot in the second round of the Chase for the Sprint Cup.
snippet: Denny Hamlin won the opening round of Nascar’s playoffs, rallying from last to first on Sunday at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill., to earn an automatic spot in the second round of the Chase for the Sprint Cup.
